author: Sven W
content: @Thomas: I have the S95 and passed on the S100 as only a minor upgrade. The RX100 appears to be only slightly larger and has similar functionality and ergonomics to the S100, hence the "direct competitor". What I hope is that the image quality of the RX100 is a noticably better than the S95 / S100 ... and no "gotcha's".
